sentences.english: In Rock, a cliff out of a stone, have been talking.
sentences.chinese: 在南岩，一座伸出悬崖的石雕，向来被人们津津乐道。

sentences.english: He hasn't stopped enthusing about his holiday since he returned.
sentences.chinese: 他度假归来，对假日情趣仍津津乐道。

sentences.english: Not only I but also she is enjoying the film.
sentences.chinese: 不仅我而且她都在津津乐道地看电影。

sentences.english: Doctors talk about diet as a part of basic good health all the time.
sentences.chinese: 医生们总是在把食谱当作基本的保健方法而津津乐道。

sentences.english: He was envied by many men, cause he had eight wives.
sentences.chinese: 而最为人津津乐道的就是他拥有八位国色天香的娇妻。

sentences.english: Harry potter most people prurient interest of course is super magic scene.
sentences.chinese: 哈利波特中最为人津津乐道的当然是特级的魔法场景。
